> OOC:  I am replying to this message because it fits better in the timel=
ine.
> 
> BIC:  Tucson could see some anxiety about the mission in the trio=
 but most of all with Wheelie.   He looks to Straight Shot and Rattrap, ges=
turing that he was all set with them at the moment.  He turns back to Wheel=
ie with an expression of understanding. 
> 
> " Don't worry, you will never=
 be too far without proper backup.  Just keep in touch with me and let me k=
now where you are as you deem necessary.  Now Leo Primes intel is correct. =
 You will follow those coordinates and it will lead right to Rodimus and th=
e others."
> 

There was a nod over from WHEELIE at Tuscon's words, "If we =
see them we are to run away, and let someone isntead fight for us this day.=
"  That was fine over for him.  Being in the front lines of the fight of th=
e behemouths of the war was well outside of his capability.
